message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CY

This paper deals with modeling persuasive interaction between users on an online discussion forum, which falls under the category of natural language processing and computational linguistics (cs.CL). The proposed deep LSTM model involves classification, which is a common task in machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.AI, cs.LG). The attention mechanism used in the model is a popular technique in deep learning and neural networks (cs.CY). The paper also involves extracting argumentative components from discussion threads, which can be seen as a form of information retrieval and text mining (cs.SI).
